lol what are they smokin? Well i havent like updated because my dumbass computer isnt working and i cant go online. grr. Today-bob had to go to the emergency room because he hurt his back. on sunday we went to my aunt Sara's house and swam in her pool.. that was awesome. on friday i was at dl's. We went to a pitching clinic and went out to lunch with stevie,vicki, nicole, and mrs. c. Then we went to the batting cages and we had fun there. then at like... 230 my mom came and got me and i got my glasses. yuck. on thursday my dad and i went out to lunch with mrs. m, dl, andrew, and jessica.. jessica was like talking to her pop.... we were worried and sort of frightened. that is all that has like happened. On ..erm... thursday my cousin is comming over (Denise) and she is sleeping over, yeah, thats cool. Then on Friday we are having the loooooong drive to p.a. and ew.. with the beast... yeah he's comming. then we are comming home on tuesday and we are bringing Jacky and she is sleeping over.. then my parents are going on their 1 year anniversary trip!! CAN YOU BELIVE IT ONE YEAR!!!oh boy... oh yeah... if you didnt know.. if anyone even reads this...? MY MOM IS PREGNANT!!! OMG!!! :) Nora

OMG! Cedar Point was awesome!!! I had soooo much fun.. and I only got burned on the back of my neck and my back of my legs!
Cedar Point- I woke up at 6 and got ready. Then we got there at the EXACT same time as Amber.. it was creepy.... So we left and we got paired with Ms.**S** ((we couldnt say her last name)).. and she was pretty cool. She had a daughter( I cant remember her name) and her daughters friend, lauren, was there. She had 2 sons too, Danny and Johnathon. So we got there and we went on the raptor,the MELENIUM FORCE...which was awesomely awesome..., the mantis, the magnum, erm.. other stuff,yeah. We waited like and hour and a half for the force. SO FUN! Then we went home and i asked amber if she thought Danny was sorta kinda cute... she was like "Cute? HE WAS SMOKING!!!!" and i was like i know.. he was hoooottttt. 
Rockies- THEY WONT THE PLAY-OFFS!!! THEY ARE AWESOME! I LOVE THEM! I got a trophy that looks like a pie... lol...

Right now i am watching space balls. really funny.

adios.
Nora

hey.

 

Today was cool.. My dad and I went bowling with Jodi, DL, Andrew, and his friend, brandon... i lost... yeah that was bad.. SOFTBALL--OMG! WE ARE AWESOME!!!! we are moved on to the champion ship and its because we are fricken awesome! Heres what happened:: We were up.. then we were down.. THEN it was the last inning andwe got two outs.. the bases were loaded.. and i was up to bat... yikes. So i went ^ there andthe first pitch was a strike.. great. the next pitch was a ball. THEN the next pitch was way over my head. BUT STUPID ME I SWUNG ANYWAYS! i hit it right inbetween 1st and 2nd... and they DIDNT CATCH IT!!! so i got to 1st then they threw it home and they over threw it .. so i ran to 2.. then i was standing there and they were all like .. LINE UP GIRLS.. and i was like oh crap .. we lost.. i thouht it was an infeild fly or something... so i was like asking them 'did we lose?' and they were like 'NO WE WON!!!' I was SO happy! gotta go go pistons!! Nora

 

Goodnight" he said.

"Daddy" she called "Do you love me??"

"What? of course i do.. why would you say that?" her dad said.

"A lot?" she asked

"A lot." he said and kissed her goodnight once again. It wasnt until he was half way out the door when she blurted

"Daddy if you really love me a lot you wont be mad about what im going to tell you.."

"What? What's wrong? Is everything...-" her dad said worried

"Mommy.." she said clutching her fathers arm "Mommy is gone.. the bad man hurt her."

Her father was tense now. He pushed his daughter away
"Nonsence" he said "Your mother is away at grandma's"

"No daddy, shes not. She came home last night early and the bad man came in with the shiny" she said now heavily breathing, holding back the tears

There was a sudden silence

"Sometimes i see the bad man.. he comes and tells me stories when you're working late and mommy's gone to bed." she continued "But last night he was mad.."

"You are sure of this?" he asked

"Yes, shh.. the bad man comes tonight"

"Stop this! Where is your mother? he cried

She closed her eyes as tears ran down her cheeks. "Mommy's in the closet"

Her father eyed the closet in disbeleif. He shakily walked over and slowly..slowly.. turned the knob

It was then that the window cracked open just a bit... and the large, bloody fingers creeped through...
"Daddy" she whispered "He's back"
